subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] had anyone....
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
I have heard many reports and personally seen in some cases where a person
on a paranormal investigation experienced rapid, unexplainable battery
drain. I myself haven't had it happen to any of my batteries. Maybe they
avoid me!
:-)

Zack
